meanings.definition: The act of making something better or improving it.
meanings.sent1: The ameliorations in the school's lunch menu were well-received by the students.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the ameliorations in her health after starting a new exercise routine.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ameliorations to the recipe made it taste even more delicious.
meanings.sent4: The ameliorations in the city's infrastructure transformed it into a modern metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The ameliorations in customer service led to an increase in satisfaction ratings.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming better or more tolerable.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the ameliorations in her mood were noticeable to everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The ameliorations in the weather made the outdoor event much more enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The ameliorations in his basketball skills were evident during the game.
meanings.sent4: The ameliorations in technology have revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent5: The ameliorations in her singing voice impressed the judges at the competition.
